list.name: Juicy Chicken Burger
list.description: Sink your teeth into our succulent chicken burger, bursting with flavor and served with your choice of toppings.

list.name: Crispy Chicken Tacos
list.description: Indulge in a crunchy delight with our crispy chicken tacos, topped with fresh salsa and creamy guacamole.

list.name: Hot dog
list.description: A classic favorite, our hot dog is grilled to perfection and topped with your favorite condiments for a satisfying bite.

list.name: Sphagetti and meat sauce
list.description: Dive into a hearty bowl of spaghetti smothered in savory meat sauce, a timeless comfort food.

list.name: Pizza
list.description: Our pizza is topped with the finest ingredients and baked to perfection, offering a taste of Italy in every slice.

list.name: Fish and Chips
list.description: Enjoy a taste of the seaside with our crispy battered fish served alongside golden fries, a British classic.

list.name: Pumpkin Cookie Dough Ice-Cream
list.description: Treat yourself to a creamy scoop of pumpkin-infused ice cream, studded with chunks of cookie dough.

list.name: Chocolate Oreo Pudding Delight
list.description: Indulge your sweet tooth with layers of rich chocolate pudding and crushed Oreo cookies, a heavenly dessert.

list.name: Crispy Chocolate Chip waffles
list.description: Start your day off right with our crispy waffles studded with chocolate chips, drizzled with maple syrup.

list.name: Old Fashioned Devils Food Cake
list.description: Satisfy your craving for chocolate with our decadent devil's food cake, rich and moist with a velvety frosting.

list.name: Peppermint Crisp Tart
list.description: Refresh your palate with our cool and creamy peppermint crisp tart, a South African favorite.

list.name: Milk Tart
list.description: Delight in the creamy goodness of our traditional milk tart, with a hint of cinnamon in a buttery crust.

list.name: Galaxy Cup cake
list.description: Blast off into flavor with our out-of-this-world galaxy cupcake, topped with colorful swirls and edible glitter.

list.name: Brownie Sundae
list.description: Indulge in the ultimate dessert experience with our fudgy brownie topped with scoops of ice cream, whipped cream, and chocolate sauce.

list.name: Magnum Ice cream
list.description: Treat yourself to a moment of luxury with our premium Magnum ice cream, coated in a thick layer of Belgian chocolate.

list.name: Mini pizza
list.description: Enjoy a bite-sized version of our classic pizza, perfect for sharing or savoring all to yourself.

list.name: Sushi
list.description: Experience the artistry of Japanese cuisine with our selection of fresh sushi, expertly crafted and bursting with flavor.

list.name: Samoosas
list.description: Delight in the crispy goodness of our savory samoosas, filled with spiced potatoes or minced meat, a beloved Indian snack.

list.name: Wings
list.description: Get your hands dirty with our finger-licking chicken wings, coated in your choice of tangy sauce for the ultimate flavor explosion.

list.name: Beef swekers
list.description: Savor the smoky goodness of our tender beef skewers, marinated to perfection and grilled to juicy perfection.

list.name: Chipotle Chicken Nachos with Jalapeño Yogurt
list.description: Spice up your snack time with our loaded nachos topped with chipotle chicken and zesty jalapeño yogurt.

list.name: Beef Burgers x 6
list.description: Gather your friends and family for a feast with our pack of six juicy beef burgers, perfect for grilling up a storm.

list.name: Custard & Jelly x2
list.description: Enjoy a nostalgic treat with our classic custard and jelly cups, a sweet and creamy delight.

list.name: Moroccan Chicken Wrap x
list.description: Transport your taste buds to Morocco with our flavorful chicken wrap, filled with exotic spices and fresh ingredients.

list.name: Rasberry mores Milkshake
list.description: Indulge in the nostalgic flavors of summer with our creamy raspberry milkshake, topped with gooey marshmallows and chocolate.

list.name: Water
list.description: Stay refreshed with our crisp and clear bottled water, the perfect companion for any meal.

list.name: Riverdale milkshake
list.description: Take a sip of nostalgia with our creamy Riverdale milkshake, inspired by the classic diner shakes of the 1950s.

list.name: Score energy drink
list.description: Power up with our invigorating Score energy drink, packed with caffeine and electrolytes for a burst of energy.

list.name: Coke
list.description: Enjoy the classic taste of Coca-Cola, ice-cold and refreshing with every sip.

list.name: Corona
list.description: Unwind with a chilled bottle of Corona beer, perfect for kicking back and relaxing.

list.name: Fanta Orange
list.description: Quench your thirst with the fruity goodness of Fanta Orange, fizzy and refreshing with every sip.

list.name: HEINEKEN
list.description: Elevate your drinking experience with a cold bottle of Heineken beer, brewed to perfection for a crisp and refreshing taste.

list.name: Rum Berry cocktail
list.description: Transport yourself to a tropical paradise with our refreshing rum berry cocktail, bursting with fruity flavor and a hint of island rum.

list.name: Perfect Vanilla Bean Iced Coffee
list.description: Start your day off right with our smooth and creamy vanilla bean iced coffee, the perfect pick-me-up for any occasion.
